paragraphs.text: The Indian government won't stop my fight to save Mahan's forests.
paragraphs.label: title

paragraphs.text: Mahan in Madhya Pradesh is one of the oldest and largest sal forests in Asia
paragraphs.label: common-ground

paragraphs.text: The local communities are dependent on the forest for their livelihoods
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: it is also home to several rare and endangered species
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: But a portion of this reserve is earmarked for open cast coal mining by Essar, a British company registered in London
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: In order to mine for coal, they would need to cut down the forest and displace those who live there
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Essar would destroy more than 1,000 hectares of pristine forests and the biodiversity that it supports, affecting 54 villages
paragraphs.label: statistics

paragraphs.text: It would also impact on the livelihoods of thousands more who depend on forest produce, and the wildlife, water and air in the region
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: For the last three years I have been helping villagers in Mahan to assert their rights, protect their forest, and prevent the open-cast coalmine development
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Unfortunately, during this time, I have experienced a wide range of intimidation tactics
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: I have received anonymous phone calls threatening violence and been followed by a car without a number plate as I travelled to village meetings
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Last year I discovered that a forged letter bearing my signature had been given to local media
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: It called on villagers to resort to violence while protesting against the mine
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: And Greenpeace India is currently appealing against a decision by the home ministry to freeze all its overseas funding, some 40% of its income
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: But Sunday marked a new low
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: I was due to travel to London to address British parliamentarians about my work with local Mahan communities
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: but
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: I was not allowed to board my flight despite having valid travel documents
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: My passport was stamped with "offloaded" at the airport
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: I was asked to go home
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: The only explanation offered was that this was being done by the orders of the government of India
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Since then, I have consulted lawyers and written to government agencies
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: I've had no official response
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: but
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: some newspapers reported that I have been put on a "blacklist" or "lookout list" preventing me from leaving the country
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Such lists are usually for those with criminal convictions
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: I don't have one
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Refusing my travel to speak to British MPs with no legal reason to do so is an infringement on my fundamental rights, and a shocking blow to the strength and freedom of civil society in India
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: My travel was legitimate
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Essar is based in London
paragraphs.label: common-ground

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: I was invited by a British all-party parliamentary group to talk about my work and to present the social and environmental impacts of the project - otherwise known as freedom of speech
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: We are equally engaged with all major parties and relevant politicians and administrators in India on this issue
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The fight in Mahan is about the rights of those people who live there and depend on the forest for their livelihoods
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The local community is only asking that due process is followed
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: under Indian law there must be a local referendum and consent from the local community
paragraphs.label: common-ground

paragraphs.text: But
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: these laws have been bypassed
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: now the government is reviewing major environmental laws, including the Forest Rights Act, that have been key in protecting forest dwellers
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: This is why a fight such as Mahan in India is critical
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It's symptomatic of how India will act when it comes to making important decisions about forests, conservation, community rights and a sustainable way of development
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The act of engaging all relevant stakeholders is part of my work as a Greenpeace member and indeed the responsibility of any vibrant civil society in any functional democracy
paragraphs.label: common-ground

paragraphs.text: Travelling to London to meet British MPs was neither an attack on the Indian government, nor a violation of the laws of our country
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Internationally, India is under a lot of pressure to make strong commitments to tackling climate change
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: yet
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: it is drawn to the cheap and immediate gains of coal despite the high social and environmental cost
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Groups such as Greenpeace are a vital check on the power of corporations and politicians
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: We fight for Indian values promoting empowered local communities and a clean environment for the next generation
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: And our campaigns, such as the push to get pesticides out of our tea, have been successful
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: That's why we're being attacked
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In a week's time, Greenpeace India will find out if its appeal against the Indian government freezing its funding is successful
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: If not, other campaign groups will be next
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Whatever the outcome, I will continue to support the rights of communities using all the democratic rights available to me
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: I will also continue to seek answers as to why I was blacklisted
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: One thing is clear
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: without a legal basis to justify my detention, the government is on thin ice
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: As I write this, it is busy shifting blame from one department to another
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: As we say in Mahan, we will fight and we will win
paragraphs.label: assumption
